amendment.description: To update the number of patriots in the United States Armed Forces who have made the ultimate sacrifice while serving in Afghanistan.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2870 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2870 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Enzi. (consideration: CR 9/21/2012 S6676; text: CR 9/21/2012 S6676) To update the number of patriots in the United States Armed Forces who have made the ultimate sacrifice while serving in Afghanistan.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2870 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Enzi.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2870 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
